name: BuilderBlox
description:
BuilderBlox is a simple but fun building game.

Controls

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON: Delete blocks

RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON: Add blocks

W and D KEYS: Move

SPACE: Jump

O KEY: Teleport to waypoint

You can drag your waypoint so you can return to it at any time.

Feel free to screenshot your builds and upload it in the comments! Wed love to see your creations.
